Pyhole Plugins¶

plugins.admin¶

Pyhole Administration Plugin

class plugins.admin.Admin(irc, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: pyhole.plugin.Plugin

Provide administration functionality

Admin.deop(*args, **kwargs)[source]

De-op a user (ex: .deop <channel> <nick>)

Admin.help(params=None, **kwargs)[source]

Learn how to use active commands (ex: .help <command>)

Admin.join(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Join a channel (ex: .join #channel [<key>])

Admin.nick(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Change IRC nick (ex: .nick <nick>)

Admin.op(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Op a user (ex: .op <channel> <nick>)

Admin.part(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Part a channel (ex: .part <channel>)

Admin.reload(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Reload all plugins

Admin.say(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Send a PRIVMSG (ex: .say <channel>|<nick> message)

Admin.version(params=None, **kwargs)[source]

Display the current version
